name: PeopleSoft: Avoid disabling insert or delete on grid based on a record table
associatedValueName: RecordTable referenced by the page field
description: If the main record for the grid is a Record Table, you should uncheck the "No Row Insert" and "No Row Delete" properties in the Use properties
output: Failed checks gives the number of pages that contain wrongly defined grids. The grid name can be found in the value column
rationale: As grid integrates data entry controls, you should be careful before allowing insertion or deletion
